Posts.Content: ve been on Arimidex for 6 months. I was on Tamoxifen for 2.5 years, suffered dreadful depression and aching joints, but was Tamoxifen intolerant. Just been through Cancer #2, and now on Arimidex. Have not got depression, have plenty of energy but take mountains of supplemented. Most useful for fighting fatigue is Taurine. This also prevents fatigue during radiation. Am doing banting 0 High fat, medium protein and low carb ( basically no carbs), and find that thie really works. But am battling with chronic arthritis. ON Methatrexate for that, butfinding I feel like an old woman ( am 55). Do Gym, spinning, swimming and running, although running is tough now as my feet get sore. Training to ultra marathons, which I used to do before C.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Agree with all the comments and the positive attitude. Can highly recommend the book The Journey by Brandon Bays. Provides a process to clear ALL negativity/anger/ etc tec from ones life. If youbbelieve that those things can cause cancer, then you can also belive that getting rid of it will heal you from within.
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body

Posts.Content: My bones have not been affected at all, but lung does show signs of damage. The worst side effect of RADs is fatigue which TAURINE prevents. I worked full time, and did all my exercise and was only tired on one day. My supplement regime inclded: Zinc ( improve the immune system) Vit E, Oil of evening primrose ( to prevent depression) Magnesium Citrate for my bones/muscles and to prevent chronic cramps. Really worked. A host of others inclduing L-Lycine which im continuing even now. My worst side effect was chronic burning ( 2nd degree). Used R1 (for immediately after each session, and R2 to help the skin recover. )
Posts.Title: new to the board question about vitamins to help keep bones healthy during radiation

Posts.Content: YOu MUST have an ultrasound and a biopsy. Cant belive they are not taking this further.
Posts.Title: abnormal MRI, MAMMOGRAM insisting I'm fine
